column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////i completely agree with the comment that lou malnatti's is mediocre (at best). i don't really like deepdish but i my cousin (from new haven
column2: home of the Best Pizza Ever) was visiting and demanded to be taken to lou's because she heard it was the best pizza in chicago. neither of us were impressed
column3: and i think i was even less so than her.
